summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mixed on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 8
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Wednesday, with eight gaining and the other 10 declining.
Bitcoin fell 0.3% to $21,992 by market close.
